jcr:content.jcr:description: New Lone Peak 7 trail running shoes feature a sticky MaxTrac™ outsole and Altra EGO™ midsole to help you conquer legendary terrain with confidence.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Lone Peak 7
jcr:content.pageTitle: New Lone Peak 7 Trail Running Shoes

customhtml2_90919454.customHTML: The New Lone Peak 7

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
BORN A LEGEND. NOW LEGENDARY.

Tackle the trails with confidence in the new Lone Peak 7. With a seamless upper, stickier MaxTrac™outsole, and Original FootShape™ Fit, this legendary trail shoe is ready to hit the dirt.

image.alt: kneee down shot of lone peak 7

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Run seamlessly

Our best-in-class trail shoe is now designed with a seamless upper. This streamlined yet lightweight construction stands up to the elements, no matter what the trail throws at you. With an emphasis on durability, a secure fit, and a lightweight feel, you’ll be ready to bob, weave, hop, and shuffle through any trail adventure.

Get Grippy

Wet trails? No problem. The legend can handle it with the same MaxTrac™ outsole you know and love, but stickier. Hug the trails with grippy traction in any condition. With a multi-directional lug pattern, you’ve never felt more connected to the dirt.

image.alt: runner coming downhill in the twilight

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Spring in your step

Whether you’re hitting a quick out-and-back or gearing up for a 50K trail race, the new Lone Peak 7 will help keep you comfortable and charged. Altra EGO™ midsole foam provides the underfoot protection you need with a responsive yet soft feel. It’s the perfect amount of cushion for wherever the journey takes you.

Open Spaces

The new Lone Peak 7 features our Original FootShape™ Fit so you can move naturally over miles of trail. This spacious toe box allows your feet to spread out, your toes to relax, and your body to move more instinctively.

image.alt: runner with a headlamp headed into the wilderness
people overlooking a sunset in the woods
